    rcwChart3

    BarChart

    rcwChart(rcwData, type = "bar")
    new rcwCharts.BarChart( document.getElementById('root1'), options, data);

    ScatterChart

    rcwChart(rcwData, type = "scatter")
    new rcwCharts.ScatterChart(document.getElementById('root2'), options, data);

    RowChart

    rcwChart(rcwData, type = "row")
    new rcwCharts.RowChart( document.getElementById('root3'), options, data);

    const data = [{ datapoints: [
